articles.title: Andy Serkis raises nearly £300,000 in 12-hour ‘Hobbit’ readathon - NME
articles.description: Gollum actor Andy Serkis has raised nearly £300,000 for charity with his readathon for 'The Hobbit', which saw him read the entire book in one sitting.
articles.content:
Andy Serkis has raised £280,000 with his The Hobbit readathon this week.
The actor, who plays Gollum in the classic film series, read the whole J.R.R. Tolkein book in one sitting on Friday (May 8).
It took the actor just under 11 hours to finish the book, a… [+1624 chars]

articles.description: The Hereditary Grand Duchess of Luxembourg, Stephanie, has given birth to her first child, a son, at the Grand Duchess Charlotte Maternity Hospital in Luxembourg City at 5:13 am this morning. The c…
articles.content:
The Hereditary Grand Duchess of Luxembourg, Stephanie, has given birth to her first child, a son, at the Grand Duchess Charlotte Maternity Hospital in Luxembourg City at 5:13 am this morning. 
The child weighs 3,190 kg and is 50 cm.

articles.content:

articles.description: Miriam Margolyes says she then decided she wanted British PM to survive when he was hospitalized, but laments 'he didn't get better as a human being'
articles.content:

articles.title: Andre Harrell death: Uptown Records founder dies aged 59 - The Independent
articles.description: Mark Ronson and director Ava DuVernay were among those to pay tribute
articles.content:
Music mogul and Uptown Records founder Andre Harrell has died aged 59.
News of Harrells death was announced by DJ D-Nice via an Instagram Live on 9 May. The cause of his death is currently unknown.

articles.title: Vera Lynn's immortality explained: Why VE Day hero will still be relevant in Year 3000 - Express
articles.description: DAME VERA LYNN played an instrumental role in keeping up wartime morale and is highly respected today - but unearthed accounts reveal why she will still be relevant even in the next millennium.
